title: Did Justin Bieber help ex-girlfriend Selena Gomez during her Lupus struggle?
text:
Pop star Justin Bieber reportedly was a sweet and caring ex-boyfriend Selena Gomez during her struggle with lupus disease. Gomez opened up earlier this month that she had undergone chemotherapy to treat the illness when she was rumoured having addiction to drugs.
The "What Do You Mean?" hitmaker pampered Selena during her hard time dealing with the illness, reported Aceshowbiz.
The 23-year-old songstress was afraid before beginning treatment, particularly because she might lose her hair, but "she had Justin to support her through the whole ordeal."
Detailing the actions that Bieber, 21, would take to show his support for Selena, the source said, "He would always tell her she's the most beautiful girl in the world, and that it wouldn't matter if she gained weight, lost her hair, or anything."
"He would make up little songs for her...and if they were both in LA, he'd come over and order in her favorite foods from all the most expensive restaurants in Beverly Hills," the source said.
The couple was dating on and off before they broke up last year.
"They have obviously had a lot of ups and downs in their relationship, but he really stepped up for her," the source says of the exes, adding, "That's not to say there haven't been plenty of other times when he was a jerk, but he knew she was struggling, and he wanted to let her know he was there for her."
